sources.title: NextEra Energy Partners - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: NextEra Energy Partners is a limited partnership formed in 2014 by NextEra Energy. [1] [2] [3]In June 2014, NextEra Energy announced an initial public offering for NextEra Energy Partners after the previously wholly owned subsidiary was approved for listing on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol "NEP."
